umontreal.iro.lecuyer.probdist.LogisticDist

    umontreal.iro.lecuyer.probdist

    • Uses of LogisticDist in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.probdist

      Methods in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.probdist that return LogisticDist 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static LogisticDist LogisticDist.getInstanceFromMLE(double[] x, int n)
      Creates a new instance of a logistic distribution with parameters α and λ estimated using the maximum likelihood method based on the n observations x[i], i = 0, 1,…, n - 1.

    • Uses of LogisticDist in umontreal.iro.lecuyer.randvar

      Constructor and Description
      LogisticGen(RandomStream s, LogisticDist dist)
      Creates a new generator for the logistic distribution dist and stream s.
